item.title: Jogulamba Gadwal Police Launch QR Code Feedback System to Enhance Public Services
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: District SP T Srinivas Rao, IPS, stated that feedback from citizens visiting police stations or circle offices regarding the services provided by the police is highly valued. He urged people to utilize the QR code system to share their opinions about the services they receive.
As part of this initiative, Telangana State DGP Mr. Jitender, IPS, officially launched a newly designed QR code to gather public feedback on Telangana Police services. Following this, District SP Mr. Srinivas Rao ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
